Trade/Device Name(s): Prodigy Choice Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Prodigy Choice Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using an electrochemical biosensor.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, forearm, palm, upper-arm, calf, or thigh by a single person for self-testing at home as an aid to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
